repo.description: Small GitHub utilities like pull-status and changelog generator
repo.name: hs-github-tools

body: This is a completion for @reviewable created to ensure good reviews across all Tox repos. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40)

comment_regular_data.body:
Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 4 unresolved discussions.

---

*[reviewable_script.js, line 14 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40#-K_RPuKtreFUfLt5JrBe:-K_RPuKtreFUfLt5JrBf:bjwxdgu) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/github-tools/blob/1881bb27740c690c3ca35dbd4b715d404911396d/reviewable_script.js#L14)):*
> ```JavaScript
> 
> 
> const numReviewersRequired = 2; // Must be 1 less than the number desired...
> ```

Why 1 less? It's unintuitive and therefore needs a comment, but why is it necessary to be unintuitive in the first place?

---

*[reviewable_script.js, line 74 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40#-K_RQQcX_-pNh77VB3Gw:-K_RQQcX_-pNh77VB3Gx:b-5t6xbl) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/github-tools/blob/1881bb27740c690c3ca35dbd4b715d404911396d/reviewable_script.js#L74)):*
> ```JavaScript
> // Part 4 Check that a trusted reviewer has a current LGTM.
> const trustedReviewers = ['GrayHatter', 'iphydf', 'nurupo'];
> const admin_approved = _.some(trustedReviewers, username => approvals[username]);
> ```

Camel case.

---

*[reviewable_script.js, line 90 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40#-K_RQ7FgSfm3HPHkmldF:-K_RQ7FgSfm3HPHkmldG:b-610gt5) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/github-tools/blob/1881bb27740c690c3ca35dbd4b715d404911396d/reviewable_script.js#L90)):*
> ```JavaScript
> }
> if (unresolvedDiscussions.length) {
>   if (unresolvedDiscussions.length > 2) {
> ```

```js
const s = unresolvedDiscussions.length == 1 ? '' : 's';
descriptionPieces.push(`${unresolvedDiscussions.length} open discussion${s} remaining`);
```

---

*[reviewable_script.js, line 101 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40#-K_RQ4jQorFLpqEpkSz7:-K_RQ4jQorFLpqEpkSz8:bsk7v7s) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/github-tools/blob/1881bb27740c690c3ca35dbd4b715d404911396d/reviewable_script.js#L101)):*
> ```JavaScript
> 
> if (!admin_approved) {
>   descriptionPieces.push(`Missing Admin LGTM at current revision.`);
> ```

Lowercase `missing`.

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 5 unresolved discussions.

---

*[reviewable_script.js, line 17 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/github-tools/40#-K_RQjcttomry2Am4EqX:-K_RQjcttomry2Am4EqY:b-mlpn2f) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/github-tools/blob/1881bb27740c690c3ca35dbd4b715d404911396d/reviewable_script.js#L17)):*
> ```JavaScript
> // Part 1 Check that each file has been reviewed by at least numReviewersRequired at the latest revision.
> const unreviewedFiles = _(review.files)
>                          .filter(file => _.size(_.last(file.revisions).reviewers) <= numReviewersRequired)
> ```

Inconsistent hanging indentation.

---

commit.message:
Create reviewable_script.js

This is a completion for @reviewable created to ensure good reviews across all Tox repos.
